data.title: B Safe Post Plant Incendiary From Outside Main
data.description: Here's a simple, yet effective way to play the post-plant situation with your Incendiary.

data.title: B Site Wall + Market Smokes For Safe Plant
data.description: Use these Sky Smokes to setup an easy safe plant towards the B Site. The site smokes will also allow you to potentially pop out and catch Defenders off-guard towards the back site.

data.title: A Site Smokes to CT + Link
data.description: Cover common defender sightlines on A Site with these Sky Smoke lineups.

data.title: A Main to A Default Molly
data.description: This Incendiary lineup allows you to deny defenders spike from A Main.
